roleset.name: going down, causing to fall

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: And, if a diver at a greater depth is not neutrally buoyant, his dropping a weight belt may not lead to his ascent.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on drop.01. Corresponds to VNcls calibratable_cos-45.6-1, meander-47.7, put_direction-9.4, roll-51.3.1.

roleset.name: removal, ending

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Smith said the offer depends on his dropping a countersuit.

example.name: losing
example.text: A big reason for Bowers breakout was his dropping 20 pounds in the offseason.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on drop.05. Corresponds to VNcls fire-10.10.

roleset.name: giving, esp. names

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: Also , I ca n't decide what s more hilarious , Iamaloneontheforum 's manifesto , or christopher robin 's hipster rap name dropping .

roleset.name: spending money

example.name: args 1, 2`
example.text: Tell me I'm not an idiot for dropping a grand on this computer.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on drop.07.

roleset.name: dropping_by: coming for a short visit

example.name: Arg 0, argMs
example.text: The thing that I remembered best about my father was his dropping by in my younger years to whip me for being so bad.
example.arg: to whip me for being so bad

roleset.note: Added by Julia. based on drop.02. No corresponding VNcls.

roleset.name: leaving behind

example.name: All args
example.text: He does not take no for an answer, so you are intimidated into agreeing to his dropping off the goods at a location of his choice
example.arg: at a location of his choice

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on drop.03. No VNcls.

roleset.name: quitting

example.name: both args
example.text: It's unfortunate that money is the factor in his dropping out of the race
